page.title: 10SERVICES IN POYNTINGTON
page.content: A{Playcentre}on four mornings a week in Poyntington offers under 5's the opportunity to learn to socialise & children come to it from other villages. When needed{Meals-on-Wheels for frail & elderly can be delivered by local members of the Women's Royal Voluntary Service. Individuals will arrange{fund raising events in their homes or in the village hall for National Charities or for overseas aid. Many residents in the area will belong to{clubs}of their choosing in the vicinity e.g. Rotary, Round Table, Lions, Mother's Union, Sports, Drama, Musical, Flower Arranging or for Cultural Interests.
